TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXamlNamespaceResolver

Docs.summary: Describes a service that can return a XAML namespace that is based on its prefix as it is mapped in XAML markup.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Type converters and markup extensions can query for IXamlNamespaceResolver as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
## WPF Usage Notes This interface is also implemented as part of the WPF XAML implementation in the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDictionary> class. <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDictionary> stores XAML namespace information and interacts with XAML processors to forward that information to the service context through the same <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IXamlTypeResolver> interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetNamespace(string prefix) cil managed

Docs.param: The prefix for which to retrieve the XAML namespace information.
Docs.summary: Retrieves a XAML namespace identifier for the specified prefix string.
Docs.returns: The requested XAML namespace identifier, as a string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration> GetNamespacePrefixes() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns all the possible prefix-to-XAML namespace mappings ( values) that are available in the active XAML schema context.
Docs.returns: An enumerable set of values. To get all the prefix strings, get the <xref:System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration.Prefix%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value from each value in the returned set. To get prefixes for specific XAML namespaces, process any return value that has the desired <xref:System.Xaml.NamespaceDeclaration.Namespace%2A> value.
